name: Aliens
startIntroPart2: This is an overpowered joke nation just as an example for the mods feature. Set Phasers to Obliterate!!
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.

name: Knights of the Forest
startIntroPart2: We stand for honour, clan, and game. We will protect the forests and the innocent.
declaringWar: Surrender, do not make us destroy you.
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
introduction: J'rohn, a pleasure to meet you.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
uniques: Great General provides double combat bonus
[+20]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in all cities]
[+25]% Production towards any buildings that already exist in the Capital
[-50]% Gold cost of acquiring tiles [in all cities]
[+2 Science] from every specialist [in all cities]
Receive a tech boost when scientific buildings/wonders are built in capital
All units move through Forest and Jungle Tiles in friendly territory as if they have roads. These tiles can be used to establish City Connections upon researching the Wheel.

Cities are razed [2] times as fast
Can spend Gold to annex or puppet a City-State that has been your ally for [5] turns.
Gain a free [Harbor] [in all coastal cities]
Land units may cross [Mountain] tiles after the first [Great General] is earned
May choose [1] additional belief(s) of any type when [founding] a religion

[+2 Faith] [in all cities] <with [3] to [6] neighboring [Forest] tiles>
